contactText: If you have questions about this policy or your data, please contact support.
howWeUseItText: We use your data to provide and secure the app, fight fraud and abuse, improve features and – if you have given consent – measure usage and performance.
intro: We respect your privacy. This page explains what data we collect and why. We only collect the minimum necessary to operate the Loventia service.
title: Privacy Policy

whatWeCollectItems.accountDetails: Account details (email, profile data you add).
whatWeCollectItems.analytics: Optional analytics (only if you consent) to understand how the app is used.
whatWeCollectItems.technicalLogs: Technical logs (IP address, browser and device information) to secure the service.

yourRightsText: You can request access, correction or deletion of your data at any time. You can also withdraw consent where it was the legal basis for processing.
